transportables.highpowered_rail.tooltip_: §5When powered: Speeds up minecart to maxmimum speed.
transportables.launching_rail.tooltip_01: §5When powered: Launches minecart into the air.
transportables.telesender_rail.tooltip_0: §5When powered: Teleports minecart to set destination.
transportables.iron_ladder.tooltip_01: §5Allows you to climb faster than a regular ladder.
transportables.raillinker.tooltip_02: §5Use on a rail to save it's position.
transportables.raillinker.tooltip_03: §5Sneak + use on a tele-sender to update destination.
